[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [TileDataAccessor](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.md) &gt; [getGeometryAccessor](./harp-mapview.tiledataaccessor.getgeometryaccessor.md)

## TileDataAccessor.getGeometryAccessor() method

Obtains an accessor for the nonindexed geometry. This function may return `undefined` if the accessor is not implemented.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected getGeometryAccessor(geometryType: GeometryType, object: THREE.Mesh, bufferGeometry: THREE.BufferGeometry): IGeometryAccessor | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  geometryType | [GeometryType](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrytype.md) | The type of geometry. |
|  object | THREE.Mesh | The object for which to access the attributes and geometry. |
|  bufferGeometry | THREE.BufferGeometry | The object's <code>BufferGeometry</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[IGeometryAccessor](./harp-mapview.igeometryaccessor.md) \| undefined

an accessor for a specified object, if available.
